com.slickpath.mobile.android.simple.vm

Interface IVMListener


  • public interface IVMListener
    Interface - Callback interface for Listeners to VirrualMachaince Instruction Events - completedAddingInstructions - completedRunningInstructions
    Author:
    Pete Procopio

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void completedAddingInstructions(VMError vmError)
      Callback - Called when VM is completed adding instructions VMError will be null if no error
      void completedRunningInstructions(boolean bHalt, int lastLineExecuted, VMError vmError)
      Callback - Called when VM has completed running instructions .
